comment: FIWARE - Open311 Service Request adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.IssueTracking/master/Open311_ServiceRequest/schema.json
description: An entity of type ServiceRequest is an acceptable Open 311 service request. Such entity encompasses all the properties defined by Open 311 at POST Service Request and GET Service Request.

contents.name: agency_responsible
contents.comment: Please note that this is semantically equivalent to the provider property (name subproperty) of schema.org

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: email
contents.comment: Email address of owner.

contents.name: expected_datetime
contents.comment: The date and time when the service request can be expected to be fulfilled. This may be based on a service-specific service level agreement

contents.name: first_name
contents.comment: Given name. In the U.S., the first name of a Person.

contents.name: jurisdiction_id
contents.comment: The unique ID of the legal entity of the service (i.e. city).

contents.name: last_name
contents.comment: Family name. In the U.S., the last name of a Person.

contents.name: media_url
contents.comment: A URL to media associated with the request, eg an image

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: phone
contents.comment: The telephone number.

contents.name: requested_datetime
contents.comment: The date and time when the service request was made

contents.name: service_code
contents.comment: The unique identifier for the service request type.

contents.name: service_name
contents.comment: The human readable name of the service request type.

contents.name: service_notice
contents.comment: Information about the action expected to fulfill the request or otherwise address the information reported.

contents.name: service_request_id
contents.comment: The unique ID of the service request created.

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: status_notes
contents.comment: Explanation of why status was changed to current state or more details on current status than conveyed with status alone.

contents.name: updated_datetime
contents.comment: The date and time when the service request was last modified. For requests with status=closed, this will be the date the request was closed

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
